TopicTitle: My ability to detect obvious thing seems impaired, today. I can't figure out how to change my profile signature. Help?

Articles.Content: What it says. I go to my profile page, and can't seem to find the link that allows me to alter my signature. Help me, Obi-Wan!
Click on your name on the top right, then go to account settings, finally, 'Signature' will be on the far right

Just now, Spaceception said:

Click on your name on the top right, then go to account settings, finally, 'Signature' will be on the far right

I was just about to say exactly that.
Moved to Kerbal Network, since it's about the forum rather than the game.

Go to your account settings (Username>account settings) then click the "Signature" tab.

(More correct answers is better, right?)

Thanks for all the replies. I finally figured out how to access the list of threads I've subscribed to, It's been a couple of years since I was on a regular forum, and nothing ever seems to be quite where I expected to find it.

Again, thanks!
